about_the_game:
Embrace the eerie charm of a Grim Reaper in this haunting narrative flight simulation.


The game plunges you into dark, mysterious landscapes shrouded in shadows and secrets. Your task is to glide through these foreboding realms, shooting cages to free tormented souls. Each freed soul recounts a chilling story, piece by piece, revealing 11 short, spine-tingling tales that delve into the macabre and the supernatural.

The non-violent gameplay is designed to be immersive yet unsettling, creating an atmosphere of suspense and intrigue. Collect energy to fuel your shots, explore the haunting beauty of the game’s environments, and experience a spooky adventure where every soul's story adds a new layer to the dark narrative.

The game begins with you donning the cloak of a charming yet eerie flying Grim Reaper, setting out in a dark and mysterious world. The atmosphere is thick with suspense as you explore shadowy landscapes, each corner hiding secrets and untold stories. As you glide through these haunting realms, you come across cages that hold tormented souls, their ghostly murmurs echoing in the darkness.

Initially, you find yourself unable to open these cages, but your exploration soon leads you to discover soul energy scattered like spectral remnants throughout the environment. This energy is essential, granting you the power to shoot and break open the cages. With this newfound ability, you aim and shatter the cages, freeing the trapped souls within.

Each soul you collect reveals a piece of its chilling story, adding a layer of spookiness and intrigue to your journey. These stories are dark and eerie, each fragment slowly building up to unveil the soul's haunting past. As you gather more souls, you piece together their full narratives, with each level presenting a new, spooky short story to uncover.

The gameplay is non-violent but deeply immersive, creating a haunting yet captivating experience. You continue this journey across various levels, each offering new, eerie
